周.definition: to make a circuit; to circle; circle; circumference; lap; cycle; complete; all; all over; thorough; to help financially

周一嶽.definition: York Chow or Chow Yat-ngok (1947-), Hong Kong doctor and politician, Secretary for Health, Welfare and Food since 2004

周三徑一.definition: when the circumference is three, the diameter is (approximately) one

周作人.definition: Zhou Zuoren (1885-1967), brother of Lu Xun 魯迅|鲁迅[Lu3 Xun4], academic in Japanese and Greek studies, briefly imprisoned after the war as Japanese collaborator, persecuted and died of unknown causes during the Cultural Revolution

周傳瑛.definition: Zhou Chuanying (1912-1988), Kunqu 崑曲|昆曲[Kun1 qu3] opera actor

周全.definition: comprehensive; thorough; to bring one's help; to assist

周公.definition: Duke of Zhou (11th c. BC), son of King Wen of Zhou 周文王[Zhou1 Wen2 wang2], played an important role as regent in founding the Western Zhou 西周[Xi1 Zhou1], and is also known as the "God of Dreams"

周到.definition: thoughtful; considerate; attentive; thorough; also pr. [zhou1 dao5]

周勃.definition: Zhou Bo (?-169 BC), military man and politician at the Qin-Han transition, a founding minister of Western Han

周口市.definition: Zhoukou, prefecture-level city in Henan Province 河南省[He2nan2 Sheng3]

周口店.definition: Zhoukoudian prehistoric site in Fangshan district 房山區|房山区[Fang2 shan1 qu1], Beijing

周宣王.definition: King Xuan, eleventh King of Zhou, reigned (828-782 BC)

周寧.definition: Zhouning county in Ningde 寧德|宁德[Ning2 de2], Fujian

周寧縣.definition: Zhouning county in Ningde 寧德|宁德[Ning2 de2], Fujian

周小川.definition: Zhou Xiaochuan (1948-), Chinese economist, governor of the People's Bank of China 中國人民銀行|中国人民银行[Zhong1guo2 Ren2min2 Yin2hang2] 2002-2018

周幽王.definition: King You of Zhou (795-771 BC), last king of Western Zhou 西周[Xi1 Zhou1]

周延.definition: exhaustive; distributed (logic: applies to every instance)

周恩來.definition: Zhou Enlai (1898-1976), Chinese communist leader, prime minister 1949-1976

周成王.definition: King Cheng of Zhou (1055-1021 BC), reigned 1042-1021 BC as the 2nd king of Western Zhou 西周[Xi1 Zhou1], son of King Wu of Zhou 周武王[Zhou1 Wu3 wang2]

周扒皮.definition: Zhou the exploiter, archetypal character in short story 半夜雞叫|半夜鸡叫[ban4 ye4 ji1 jiao4]

周折.definition: twists and turns; vicissitude; complication; difficulty; effort; CL:番[fan1]

周敦頤.definition: Zhou Dunyi (1017-1073), Song dynasty neo-Confucian scholar

周文王.definition: King Wen of Zhou state (c. 1152-1056 BC), reigned c. 1099-1056 BC as king of Zhou state, leading figure in building the subsequent Western Zhou dynasty, father of King Wu of Zhou 周武王[Zhou1 Wu3 wang2] the first Zhou dynasty king

周旋.definition: to mix with others; to socialize; to deal with; to contend

周易.definition: another name for Book of Changes (I Ching) 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]

周星馳.definition: Stephen Chow (1962-), Hong Kong actor, comedian, screenwriter and film director, known for his mo lei tau 無厘頭|无厘头[wu2 li2 tou2] movies

周晬.definition: one full year (e.g. on child's first birthday); same as 週歲|周岁[zhou1 sui4]

周書.definition: History of Zhou of the Northern Dynasties, twelfth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Linghu Defen 令狐德棻[Ling2 hu2 De2 fen1] in 636 during Tang Dynasty, 50 scrolls

周有光.definition: Zhou Youguang (1906-2017), PRC linguist, considered the father of Hanyu Pinyin 漢語拼音|汉语拼音[Han4 yu3 Pin1 yin1]

周朝.definition: Zhou Dynasty; Western Zhou 西周 (1046-771 BC) and Eastern Zhou 東周|东周 (770-221 BC)

周村.definition: Zhoucun district of Zibo city 淄博市[Zi1 bo2 shi4], Shandong

周村區.definition: Zhoucun district of Zibo city 淄博市[Zi1 bo2 shi4], Shandong

周梁淑怡.definition: Selina Chow (Chow Liang Shuk-yee) (1945-), Hong Kong politician

周樹人.definition: Zhou Shuren, the real name of author Lu Xun 魯迅|鲁迅[Lu3 Xun4]

周武王.definition: King Wu of Zhou (-1043), personal name Ji Fa 姬發|姬发, reigned 1046-1043 BC as first king of Western Zhou dynasty 1046-1043 BC

周武王姬發.definition: King Wu of Zhou, personal name Ji Fa, reigned 1046-1043 BC as first king of Western Zhou dynasty 西周[Xi1 Zhou1] 1046-771 BC

周永康.definition: Zhou Yongkang (1942-), PRC petroleum engineer and politician

周渝民.definition: Zhou Yumin or Vic Zhou (1981-), Taiwan singer and actor, member of pop group F4

周潤發.definition: Chow Yun-Fat (1955-), Hong Kong TV and film star

周濟.definition: help to the needy; emergency relief; charity; to give to poorer relative; (also 賙濟|赒济)

周瑜.definition: Zhou Yu (175-210), famous general of the southern Wu kingdom and victor of the battle of Redcliff; in Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], absolutely no match for Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮[Zhu1 ge3 Liang4]

周瑜打黃蓋.definition: fig. with the connivance of both sides; fig. by mutual consent; cf Wu patriot Huang Gai submits to mock beating at the hands of General Zhou Yu to deceive Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1] before the 208 battle of Redcliff 赤壁之戰|赤壁之战[Chi4 bi4 zhi1 Zhan4]

周璇.definition: Zhou Xuan (1918-1957), Chinese singer and film actress

周瘦鵑.definition: Zhou Shoujuan (1895-1968), writer, translator and art collector in Suzhou, a victim of the Cultural Revolution

周穆王.definition: King Mu, fifth king of Zhou, said to have lived to 105 and reigned 976-922 BC or 1001-947 BC, rich in associated mythology

周立波.definition: Zhou Libo (1908-1979), left-wing journalist, translator and novelist; Zhou Libo (1967-), Chinese stand-up comedian

周章.definition: (literary) effort; trouble; pains (to get sth done); (literary) frightened; terrified

周總理.definition: Premier Zhou Enlai 周恩來|周恩来 (1898-1976)

周至縣.definition: Zhouzhi county in Xi'an 西安[Xi1 an1], Shaanxi

周莊.definition: Zhouzhuang, old canal town between Shanghai and Suzhou, tourist attraction

周華健.definition: Wakin Chau (1960-), HK-born Taiwanese singer and actor

周轉.definition: to rotate; to circulate (cash, stock etc); turnover; circulation; cash flow

周轉不開.definition: to have financial difficulties; unable to make ends meet

周轉不靈.definition: to have a cash flow problem

周轉金.definition: revolving fund; working capital; petty cash; turnover

周遊.definition: to travel around; to tour; to cross

周遊列國.definition: to travel around many countries (idiom); peregrinations; refers to the travels of Confucius

周邊.definition: periphery; rim; perimeter; surroundings; (computing) (attributive) peripheral; merch (abbr. for 周邊商品|周边商品[zhou1bian1 shang1pin3])
